name: to be an Adventure Game
description:
This demo is the start of my first indie game project. The goal is to develop an adventure game with some "zelda-like" features. But for now there is only a testing level where you can collect some coins.

The game is available for Windows and Linux, support for MacOS is not coming for now as I don't have any means to test on the platform.

This demo is developed with the Godot Game Engine and all the art is made using Pixelorama.
